title: 3 good reasons
brief_description: David Hunt is a volunteer for the Heart Foundation. He speaks of his own personal tragedies and how these particular events have motivated him to dedicate his time to the Heart Foundation. Made as part of ‘The Heart of the Story’ in association with Vic Health and the Heart Foundation.
